centralized_nlp_package.utils.config.get_config(config_path='../configs', config_name='config')[source]¶

Loads the Hydra configuration.

Parameters

  • config_name (str) – Name of the main configuration file.

Returns

Configuration object.

centralized_nlp_package.utils.helpers.construct_model_save_path(template, min_year, min_month, max_year, max_month)[source]¶

Constructs the model save path using the provided template and date components.

Parameters

  • template (str) – Template string with placeholders.

  • min_year (str) – Minimum year.

  • min_month (str) – Minimum month.

  • max_year (str) – Maximum year.

  • max_month (str) – Maximum month.

Returns

Constructed file path.

Return type

Path
